item.title: If Trump Strikes Iran: Mapping the Oil Disruption Scenarios
item.description: In last summerâ€™s Twelve-Day War, energy supplies were largely spared. But in a potential new round of fighting between the United States and Iran, energy supply disruptions and resulting price spikes are more likely.
